mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship/Receivership of Loula C Rakes Robertson, She married Walter C. Robertson while under 21 years of age, She reached 21 01.30.1913
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship/Receivership of Loula C Rakes Robertson, She married Walter C. Robertson while under 21 years of age, She reached 21 01.30.1913 Walter A. Robertson, Receiver of her estate Recorded in Ledger Book 7, page 495, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
